restaurantName: Pescarino-Sapori di Terra e di Mare
description: This warm, welcoming restaurant with a wooden ceiling and walls serves simple dishes as well as more creative, elaborate fare. The focus here is on showcasing the top-quality ingredients used (especially fish and seafood) in dishes which are influenced by Liguria, as well as elsewhere in Italy. Given the secluded location, the guestrooms on offer here are a good option.
